mapper.select: /* 사용자 메인 화면에서 최신 상품 8개 조회 */ SELECT m.goods_refurb_code , m.seller_store_num , m.goods_large_code , m.goods_small_code , m.member_id , m.goods_large_cate , m.goods_small_cate , m.goods_refurb_sell_state , m.goods_refurb_name , m.goods_normal_price , m.goods_refurb_price , m.goods_refurb_count , m.goods_refurb_harvest_date , m.goods_refurb_organic , m.file_idx , m.goods_post_summary , m.goods_post_explain , m.goods_delivery_charge , m.goods_weight , m.entry_time , s.goods_small_name , l.goods_large_name , f.file_idx , f.file_path FROM goods_management AS m INNER JOIN goods_small AS s ON m.goods_small_cate = s.goods_small_cate INNER JOIN goods_large AS l ON m.goods_large_cate = l.goods_large_cate LEFT JOIN tb_file_control AS fc ON m.goods_refurb_code = fc.reference_code LEFT JOIN tb_file AS f ON fc.file_idx = f.file_idx INNER JOIN (SELECT m.goods_refurb_code FROM goods_management AS m ORDER BY m.entry_time DESC,cast(SUBSTRING_INDEX(m.goods_refurb_code,'_',-1) AS UNSIGNED) DESC LIMIT 8) AS mr ON m.goods_refurb_code = mr.goods_refurb_code ORDER BY m.entry_time DESC ,cast(SUBSTRING_INDEX(m.goods_refurb_code,'_',-1) AS UNSIGNED) DESC;

/* 상품 코드별 상세 정보 조회 */ SELECT g.goods_refurb_code , g.seller_store_num , g.goods_large_code , g.goods_small_code , g.member_id , g.goods_large_cate , g.goods_small_cate , g.goods_refurb_sell_state , g.goods_refurb_name , g.goods_normal_price , g.goods_refurb_price , g.goods_refurb_count , g.goods_refurb_harvest_date , g.goods_refurb_organic , g.goods_post_summary , g.goods_post_explain , g.goods_delivery_charge , g.goods_weight , g.entry_time , f.file_idx , f.file_path FROM goods_management AS g LEFT JOIN tb_file_control AS fc ON g.goods_refurb_code = fc.reference_code LEFT JOIN tb_file AS f ON fc.file_idx = f.file_idx WHERE goods_refurb_code = #{goodsRefurbCode};

/* 특정상품을 제외하고 네 가지 상품 랜덤 조회 */ SELECT m.goods_refurb_code , m.seller_store_num , m.goods_large_code , m.goods_small_code , m.member_id , m.goods_large_cate , m.goods_small_cate , m.goods_refurb_sell_state , m.goods_refurb_name , m.goods_normal_price , m.goods_refurb_price , m.goods_refurb_count , m.goods_refurb_harvest_date , m.goods_refurb_organic , m.file_idx , m.goods_post_summary , m.goods_post_explain , m.goods_delivery_charge , m.goods_weight , m.entry_time , s.goods_small_name , l.goods_large_name , f.file_idx , f.file_path FROM goods_management AS m INNER JOIN goods_small AS s ON m.goods_small_cate = s.goods_small_cate INNER JOIN goods_large AS l ON m.goods_large_cate = l.goods_large_cate LEFT JOIN tb_file_control AS fc ON m.goods_refurb_code = fc.reference_code LEFT JOIN tb_file AS f ON fc.file_idx = f.file_idx WHERE m.goods_refurb_code NOT IN(#{goodsRefurbCode}) ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 4;
